file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud Homework Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the Schul-Cloud Homework service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  securitySchemes:
    jwtBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  schemas:
    copy:
      description: TODO
    homework:
      description: TODO
    homework_list:
      description: TODO
    submissions:
      description: TODO
    submissions_list:
      description: TODO

paths:
  '/homework/copy/{id}':
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          description: ID of copy to return
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/copy'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a single resource with the given id from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
  /homework/copy:
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/copy'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Creates a new resource with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/copy'
  /homework:
    get:
      parameters:
        - description: Number of results to return
          in: query
          name: $limit
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Number of results to skip
          in: query
          name: $skip
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Property to sort results
          in: query
          name: $sort
          style: deepObject
          schema:
            type: object
        - description: Query parameters to filter
          in: query
          name: filter
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework_list'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a list of all resources from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Creates a new resource with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
  '/homework/{_id}':
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of homework to return
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a single resource with the given id from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
    put:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of homework to update
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Updates the resource identified by id using data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
    patch:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of homework to update
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Updates the resource identified by id using data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
    delete:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of homework to remove
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/homework'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Removes the resource with id.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - homework
      security: []
  /submissions:
    get:
      parameters:
        - description: Number of results to return
          in: query
          name: $limit
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Number of results to skip
          in: query
          name: $skip
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Property to sort results
          in: query
          name: $sort
          style: deepObject
          schema:
            type: object
        - description: Query parameters to filter
          in: query
          name: filter
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions_list'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a list of all resources from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - submissions
      security: []
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Creates a new resource with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - submissions
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
  '/submissions/{_id}':
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of submissions to return
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a single resource with the given id from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - submissions
      security: []
    put:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of submissions to update
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Updates the resource identified by id using data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - submissions
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
    patch:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of submissions to update
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Updates the resource identified by id using data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - submissions
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
    delete:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of submissions to remove
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/submissions'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Removes the resource with id.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - submissions
      security: []
  
openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: homework
    description: A homework service.
  - name: submissions
    description: A submissions service.
